summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: Bulgaria and Romania complete the process of joining the Schengen
events.details: Bulgaria and Romania complete the process of joining the Schengen Area , lifting land border controls

events.event: Fifteen people are killed (including the perpetrator) and 57 others
events.details: Fifteen people are killed (including the perpetrator) and 57 others are injured during a vehicle-ramming and shooting attack in New Orleans , Louisiana, United States

events.event: Liechtenstein becomes the 37th country to legalize same-sex marriage
events.details: Liechtenstein becomes the 37th country to legalize same-sex marriage

events.event: Poland takes over the Presidency of the Council of the
events.details: Poland takes over the Presidency of the Council of the European Union , after the Hungarian presidency

events.event: Thirteen people are killed and 3 more injured in a
events.details: Thirteen people are killed and 3 more injured in a shooting in Cetinje , Montenegro

events.event: Ukraine halts the transportation of many Russian gas supplies through
events.details: Ukraine halts the transportation of many Russian gas supplies through the country following the expiration of a five-year transit deal, while also becoming a state party in the International Criminal Court

events.event: Indonesia becomes the tenth member to join BRICS
events.details: Indonesia becomes the tenth member to join BRICS

events.event: A 7.1 magnitude earthquake strikes Tibet , China, killing at
events.details: A 7.1 magnitude earthquake strikes Tibet , China, killing at least 126 people, with another 338 are injured

events.event: At least 29 deaths are reported, while 180,000 people are
events.details: At least 29 deaths are reported, while 180,000 people are evacuated, with fires continuing for days

events.event: Greater Los Angeles experiences the most destructive wildfires in its
events.details: Greater Los Angeles experiences the most destructive wildfires in its history , fueled by strong winds and prolonged drought conditions

events.event: Over 13,000 structures are destroyed, including most of Sunset Boulevard
events.details: Over 13,000 structures are destroyed, including most of Sunset Boulevard

events.event: Eighteen gunmen and a soldier are killed in an attack
events.details: Eighteen gunmen and a soldier are killed in an attack on the presidential palace in N'Djamena , the capital of Chad

events.event: The Commander of the Lebanese Armed Forces , Joseph Aoun
events.details: The Commander of the Lebanese Armed Forces , Joseph Aoun , is elected the 14th president of Lebanon by parliament , ending the power vacuum that lasted over two years

events.event: The European Copernicus Climate Change Service reports that 2024 was
events.details: The European Copernicus Climate Change Service reports that 2024 was the world's hottest year on record, and the first calendar year to pass the symbolic threshold of 1.5 °C of global warming

events.event: A gas station explosion in Al Bayda , Yemen, results
events.details: A gas station explosion in Al Bayda , Yemen, results in 40 deaths and dozens of others injured

events.event: 2024–25 Croatian presidential election : Zoran Milanović is re-elected for
events.details: 2024–25 Croatian presidential election : Zoran Milanović is re-elected for a second term

events.event: C/2024 G3 (ATLAS) , a non-periodic comet , reaches perihelion,
events.details: C/2024 G3 (ATLAS) , a non-periodic comet , reaches perihelion, and is dubbed The Great Comet of 2025

events.event: February 2 – The 2025 World Men's Handball Championship is
events.details: February 2 – The 2025 World Men's Handball Championship is held in Croatia , Denmark and Norway , and is won by Denmark

events.event: Colossal Biosciences and University of Melbourne create the world's first
events.details: Colossal Biosciences and University of Melbourne create the world's first artificial womb in marsupials as part of their project toward de-extinction of the thylacine

events.event: Gaza war : Israel and Hamas approve a ceasefire agreement
events.details: Gaza war : Israel and Hamas approve a ceasefire agreement that seeks to end the war, exchange Israeli hostages and Palestinian prisoners, and allow in international aid

events.event: It took effect on January 19
events.details: It took effect on January 19

events.event: The President of South Korea , Yoon Suk Yeol ,
events.details: The President of South Korea , Yoon Suk Yeol , is successfully arrested after a second attempt by police following a martial law declaration and successful impeachment motion last December

events.event: Blue Origin successfully launches its heavy-lift launch vehicle , New
events.details: Blue Origin successfully launches its heavy-lift launch vehicle , New Glenn , on its first attempt, though fails to land its first stage booster as intended

events.event: Over 100 people are killed during the clashes
events.details: Over 100 people are killed during the clashes

events.event: The 2025 Vanuatuan general election is held
events.details: The 2025 Vanuatuan general election is held

events.event: The National Liberation Army (ELN) launches multiple attacks in the
events.details: The National Liberation Army (ELN) launches multiple attacks in the Catatumbo region , northeastern Colombia

events.event: 98 people are killed in a fuel tanker explosion near
events.details: 98 people are killed in a fuel tanker explosion near Suleja , Niger State, Nigeria

events.event: The gunman injured two other people and committed suicide after
events.details: The gunman injured two other people and committed suicide after the attacks

events.event: Two Sharia judges are assassinated in their rooms at the
events.details: Two Sharia judges are assassinated in their rooms at the Supreme Court of Iran in capital Tehran

events.event: Gaza war : A ceasefire goes into effect, lasting until
events.details: Gaza war : A ceasefire goes into effect, lasting until an Israeli surprise attack on 18 March

events.event: 78 people are killed after a fire breaks out in
events.details: 78 people are killed after a fire breaks out in a hotel in the ski resort of Kartalkaya , Turkey

events.event: Micheál Martin is re-elected prime minister ( Taoiseach ) of
events.details: Micheál Martin is re-elected prime minister ( Taoiseach ) of Ireland by Dáil Éireann for a second non-consecutive term

events.event: Thailand becomes the 38th country and the first in Southeastern
events.details: Thailand becomes the 38th country and the first in Southeastern Asia to legalize same-sex marriage

events.event: A series of ongoing boycotts in Southeastern European countries took
events.details: A series of ongoing boycotts in Southeastern European countries took place of several retail stores in that region, in response to raised food prices and alleged price fixing

events.event: Record high wind speeds of 183 km/h (114 mph) are
events.details: Record high wind speeds of 183 km/h (114 mph) are recorded in Ireland, while over a million homes are left without power

events.event: Storm Éowyn hits Ireland and the United Kingdom
events.details: Storm Éowyn hits Ireland and the United Kingdom

events.event: The Dacian -era Helmet of Coțofenești , on loan from
events.details: The Dacian -era Helmet of Coțofenești , on loan from the National History Museum of Romania , is stolen along with three other gold artifacts from the Drents Museum in Assen by thieves who broke into the museum using explosives

events.event: The 2025 Belarusian presidential election is held, with incumbent Alexander
events.details: The 2025 Belarusian presidential election is held,  with incumbent Alexander Lukashenko ( independent , but of the Belaya Rus alliance) being re-elected

events.event: Chip giant Nvidia loses almost $600 billion of its value,
events.details: Chip giant Nvidia loses almost $600 billion of its value, the biggest drop for a single company in U

events.event: Global technology shares outside China fall sharply in response to
events.details: Global technology shares outside China fall sharply in response to the release of DeepSeek 's chatbot , a Chinese competitor to OpenAI 's ChatGPT

events.details: Ahmed al-Sharaa is appointed as the president of Syria , after a one-month vacancy following the fall of the Assad regime
